description: For example, standing with workers (resort workers, teachers, civil servants, nurses) who go on strike
Ensure participation, deliberation, engagement with the people, people have agency to change their circumstances
Regardless of race, nationality, ethnicity, language, religion, gender, sexuality, disability
Ensure participation, deliberation, engagement with the people, people have agency to change their circumstances
Acceptance of mistakes, fallibility (the goals of the party are bigger than any one individual. For eg if you are accused of misconduct must resign); the people over egos.
Love and respect for nature, recognition that any development on our islands requires attention to protecting the environment
The collective over the individual, community welfare as priority Community actions projects designed for each and every island and these projects should be monitored strictly.
Capacity to pursue interests and dreams, and live freely.
Devolution of power, ownership and management of resources from central government

To involve local councils, managements and island committees in development phases and identify the correct and feasible development plans relative to the geography, island concept and needs of the commons.
